Title: Šefica najvećeg zatvora u Ekvadoru brutalno likvidirana: Prelepa Maria išla ka bolnici kad su zapucali na nju - Vesti - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
Ovo je drugo ubistvo najvišeg zatvorskog zvaničnika u poslednjih devet dana. Napad na nju i njenog saputnika dogodio se oko 18 časova po lokalnom vremenu na putu između grada Daule i grada Gvajakil, gde se nalazi Kazneno-popravni dom Litoral. Ikaza je išla ka bolnici Guasmo Sur, koja se nalazi na jugu Gvajakila, kada su, prema lokalnim medijima, naoružani napadači presreli vozilo i pucali na nju, dok je sedela na mestu suvozača. Prvobitno je SNAI izvestio da je Ikaza preživela i da je prebačena u bolnicu, ali je kasnije potvrđeno da je mrtva prenosi  . Ministarstvo unutrašnjih poslova izrazilo je žaljenje zbog njenog ubistva i uputilo saučešće njenim voljenima i prijateljima. Ovo je drugo ubistvo zatvorskog službenika u poslednjih devet dana, nakon što je Aleks Guevara, direktor zatvora Lago Agrio u amazonskoj provinciji Sucumbíos, ubijen u sličnim okolnostima 3. septembra. Kazneno-popravni dom Litoral, zvanično poznat kao Guayas Muški Centar za Lišenje Slobode Broj 1, je najveći od pet zatvora koji čine zatvorski kompleks u Gvajakilu i smešta oko 12.000 zatvorenika. Više od 6.000 zatvorenika se nalazi u Kazneno-popravnom domu Litoral, koji je između 2021. i 2023. godine bio mesto najgorih masakra izazvanih sukobima između kriminalnih bandi koje su se borile za unutrašnju kontrolu, bar do militarizacije ovih centara koju je na početku godine naredio predsednik Daniel Noboa. Ulazak vojske u zatvorske objekte deo je okvira vanrednog stanja i "unutrašnjeg oružanog sukoba" koji je predsednik proglasio protiv organizovanog kriminala, što se pripisuje porastu kriminalnog nasilja koje je dovelo Ekvador do toga da bude zemlja u Latinskoj Americi sa najvećom stopom ubistava. Tokom prošle godine je iznosila 47,2 na 100.000 stanovnika. Talasi ubistava prethodno je odneo živote i drugih zatvorskih direktora, kao i opštinskih vlasti, uključujući nekoliko gradonačelnika, i nacionalnih zvaničnika, kao što je predsednički kandidat Fernando Villavicencio. Ubistvo Marije Daniel Icaza je najnoviji događaj u krizi u zatvorima koju Ekvador doživljava od kraja 2020. godine, okarakterisana nasiljem bandi, neredima i direktnim napadima na zatvorske vlasti. 12. septembra dronom je bačena bomba na najzaštićeniji zatvor u Ekvadoru, La Roca. Detonacija je uništila krov zatvora, što je dovelo do evakuacije zatvorenika i premeštanja Hosea Adolfa Maciasa Villamara (Fito), vođe najveće i najstarije kriminalne bande Ekvadora - Los Choneros. 3. oktobra ubijen je čuvar u zatvoru "El Rodeo", smeštenom u glavnom gradu priobalne provincije Manabí.7. oktobra šest kolumbijskih ubica, za koje se sumnja da su učestvovali u ubistvu predsedničkog kandidata Fernanda Villavicencia, pronađeni su obešeni u Kazneno-popravnom domu Litoral, dok je drugi optuženik u istom slučaju ubijen u zatvoru El Inca u Quitu.8. novembra Fredi Ančundia, identifikovan od strane vlasti kao vođa kriminalne bande poznate kao 'R7' i optužen za izazivanje nekih od zatvorskih masakara koji su se dogodili u Ekvadoru prethodnih godina, pronađen je obešen u Regionalnom zatvoru u Gvajakilu .27. novembra jedan od zatvorenika ubija drugog tokom nereda u zatvoru Lago Agrio, nakon što je objekat napadnut eksplozivnom napravom ispaljenom iz drona. 7. januara potvrđeno je bekstvo 'Fita' iz Regionalnog zatvora u Gvajakilu 8. januara počinje niz simultanih nereda u zatvorima koje kontroliše kriminalna banda Los Lobos, sa oko 200 talaca, uključujući policajce, čuvare i zatvorske zvaničnike, koji su trajali oko nedelju dana. Najmanje dvojica zatvorenika i jedan čuvar su ubijeni, dok je oko stotinu zatvorenika u bekstvu 15. januara je počela militarizacija zatvora, koju je naredio predsednik Daniel Noboa u okviru vanrednog stanja i "unutrašnjeg oružanog sukoba" proglašenog protiv organizovanog kriminala, s ciljem preuzimanja kontrole nad zatvorima od bandi i oduzimanja njihovih oružja, pri čemu se beleže pritužbe na kršenje ljudskih prava.16. januara je ubijen zatvorski čuvar u amazonskom gradu Lago Agrio. 28. marta u neredima u regionalnm zatvoru u Gvajakilu ubijena su tri zatvorenika, a šestoro drugih je povređeno.21. aprila direktor zatvora El Rodeo je ubijen tokom dana glasanja za referendum koji je sazvao predsednik Daniel Noboa kako bi odobrio reforme za jačanje borbe protiv organizovanog kriminala, uključujući povećane vojne kontrole oko zatvora.1. maja izbila je humanitarna kriza u zatvorima. Izveštaji ljudskopravaških organizacija upozoravaju na ozbiljnu humanitarnu krizu u ekvadorskim zatvorima, ukazujući na nedostatak pristupa pijaćoj vodi, hrani i adekvatnoj medicinskoj nezi za zatvorenike. 22. jula naoružana grupa upala je u zdravtsveni centar u Gvajakilu kako bi omogućila bekstvo četvorici od pet zatvorenika koji su trebali da prime medicinsku pomoć.31. avgusta dva čuvara koja su radila u Litoralu su ubijena u Gvajakilu. 3. septembra direktor zatvora Lago Agrio u amazonijskoj provinciji Sucumbíos ubijen je u napadu, u kojima su druga dva zatvorska radnika povređena. 5. septembra, po drugi put u manje od godinu dana, bačena je bomba dronom na krov zatvora La Roca. 12. septembra direktor Kazneno-popravnog doma Litoral ubijen je u napadu koji se pripisuje kriminalnim bandama koje deluju unutar i van zatvorskog sistema. Title: Lončar: Sledećeg vikenda pozvaćemo na pregled sve koji čekaju na skener - Vesti - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
, a ima ih oko 3.000 biti pozvani na ovaj pregled sledećeg vikenda. "Radićemo celu subotu i nedelju od sedam ujutru do sedam uveče. Radićemo skener na svim aparatima koje imamo i koji su trenutno u funkciji i očekujem da u ponedeljak nemamo listu čekanja na skener", rekao je on za TV Prva. Pojasnio je da će pacijenti biti pozvani, da će biti napravljen raspored i da će se raditi tri do četiri pregleda na sat vremena. Govoreći o tome šta će se u narednom periodu raditi na rešavanju problema lista čekanja što je juče najavio predsednik Srbije  , Lončar je rekao da je plan da do kraja meseca liste čekanja budu krajnje transparentne i dostupne svim građanima Srbije. "Plan je da budu dostupne i onima koji čekaju i onima koji ne čekaju, i da oni mogu u realnom vremenu da prate gde se nalaze na toj listi čekanja. Ali ne da prate, a da ne znaju šta se dešava, nego da prate tako da se u realnom vremenu zna koliko se kojih operacija uradilo u kojoj zdravstvenoj ustanovi. Mi ćemo u naredne dve nedelje izaći sa tim, koji je plan, koliko koja ustanova mora da uradi operacije na dnevnom nivou, koliko na nedeljnom nivou", naglasio je  . Rekao je da se   i da će se rešavanje problema liste čekanja raditi tako da ostali pacijenti ne trpe zbog toga. "Onda će građani Srbije u realnom vremenu gledati sve to, koliko se gde obavila operacija, da li neko radi više, da li neko radi manje, znaće se koliko je kome zadato operacija. Mislim da je to najpoštenije i onda ne mogu ni doktori ni sestre da nalaze opravdanja", rekao je Lončar. Istakao je da će se ovaj problem temeljno rešavati,  Predsednik Srbije Aleksandar Vučić rekao je juče da na listama čekanja ima više od 68.000 pacijenata i da većina njih ne može da se kreće i dodao da je taj problem u zdravstvu lociran i da se radi na rešavanju, kao i da u najkraćem roku, za godinu dana, očekuje da se liste smanje za pet do deset hiljada. Title: Vučević uputio posebnu molbu građanima Srbije: "Ne brine me reakcija Prištine" - Vesti - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
Miloš Vučević istakao je da je glavni zaključak sa sednice jeste da su sva ministarstva dobila svoje zadatke ne bi li se na najbolji mogući način sprovele sve mere koje je predsednik Srbije Aleksandar Vučić. - Naložene su aktivnosti i mere koje sva ministarstva moraju da primene, u smislu pravne i socio-ekonomske zaštite Srba na Kosovu i nacionalnih i držvavnih interesa Srbije na Kosovu - rekao je Vučević. - Naravno da nećemo imati ratove, ali je mnogo važno da Srbi ostanu na teritoriji Kosova i Metohije. Vučević je ovom prilikom istakao i da ne brine zbog reakcije Prištine: - Da oni ne terorišu Srbe na KiM, mi ne bismo morali da donesemo nikakvu odluku. Mi moramo da im pokažemo da smo država, a ne neka paradržva ili lažna država. Mi smo članica Ujedinjenih Nacija. Uopšte me ne brine njihova reakcija. Danas je održana promocija najmlađih oficira Vojske Srbije i tom prilikom Aleksandar Vučić istakao je da će se vratiti vojni rok od 75 dana. O tome je govorio i Miloš Vučević nakon sednice Vlade: - Ministarstvu odbrane upućen je zahtev da hitno pokrene proceduru za vraćanje obaveznog vojnog roka od 75. dana. Sledeće nedelje ćemo imati sednicu Vlade na kojem ćemo usvojiti tu odluku. Danas u toku dana održana je sednica Vlade Republike Srbije na kojoj su se donosile odluke po pitanju mera koje je sinoć predložio predsednik Republike Srbije Aleksandar Vučić. Miloš Vučević održao je koferenciju za medije tokom koje je javnosti približio šta se dešavalo na sednici i kakve su odluke donete. - Sinoć smo nakon konferecije odlučili da danas krenemo u realizaciju onoga što je danas sinoć govorio - rekao je Miloš Vučić i zamolio da građane da ponovo pogledaju konferenciju i da razumeju šta je predsednik Vučić sinoć govorio. , a koji su usmereni protiv opstanka srpskog naroda na severu KiM.  po pitanju KiM. Pre nego što je ukazao na konkretne mere, on se osvrnuo na kontekst u kojem se mere donose. Tim povodom danas je  . Pošaljite nam Vaše snimke, fotografije i priče na broj telefona   (  /   /  ). Title: Mrtve ptice padaju sa neba u Austriji, ljudi zabrinuti: "Sakupljamo kilograme beživotnih lasta" - Vesti - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
Glavni čuvar zoološkog vrta, Stefana Šajdla, u skloništu za životinje Vosendorf u Austriji, ima pune ruke posla dok pokušava da dramatičnu situaciju stavi pod kontrolu.  "Trenutno sam pod Bečkim Rajhsbrikom gde životinje traže sklonište i skupljaju u velikom broju, ima ih na stotine.  ", kaže on, opisujući trenutnu operaciju. Zbog hladnog i vlažnog vremena, leteći insekti, glavni izvor hrane za ptice, jedva da su aktivni, a to dovodi do toga da mnoge lastavice brzo ostaju oslabljene i na zemlji. Zbog toga je situacija veoma ozbiljna za preostale ptice selice. Organizacija za zaštitu životinja odmah je reagovala na vanrednu situaciju, te poziva stanovništvo da prijavi oslabljene lastavice ili one kojima je potrebna pomoć i da ih dovede u sklonište za životinje Vosendorf. "Naš tim radi danonoćno da spasi ove životinje. Mogu se ostaviti u skloništu za životinje u bilo kom trenutku, a naš broj za hitne slučajeve dostupan je za prijavu bilo kakvog okupljanja lasta", kaže Šajdl. Title: Oracle Expands Distributed Cloud Innovations to Drive AI and Cloud Service Advancements Across Major Platforms
Article Content: Oracle announced new Oracle Cloud Infrastructure (OCI) distributed cloud innovations to help meet the rapidly growing global demand for its AI and cloud services. The latest innovations span Oracle Database@AWS, Oracle Database@Azure, Oracle Database@Google Cloud, OCI Dedicated Region, and OCI Supercluster. With Oracle’s distributed cloud, customers can deploy OCI’s 150+ AI and cloud services at the edge, in their own datacenter, across clouds, or in the public cloud and can help address a variety of data privacy, sovereign AI, and low latency requirements. In addition, Oracle Cloud is available in more locations than any other hyperscaler, with 85 regions live and 77 planned. “Our priority is giving customers the choice and flexibility to leverage cloud services in the model that makes the most sense for their business,” said  . “With OCI’s distributed cloud capabilities, we’re helping customers deploy a dedicated cloud in a small, scalable footprint, build applications with the best services across cloud providers, and deploy AI infrastructure anywhere they want. This flexibility helps our customers address their unique needs and support their cloud investments in delivering significant business value.” OCI is now taking orders for the largest AI supercomputer in the cloud—available with up to 131,072 NVIDIA Blackwell GPUs—delivering an unprecedented 2.4 zettaFLOPS of peak performance. The maximum scale of OCI Supercluster offers more than three times as many GPUs as the Frontier supercomputer and more than six times that of other hyperscalers. OCI Supercluster includes OCI Compute Bare Metal, ultra-low latency RoCEv2 with ConnectX-7 NICs and ConnectX-8 SuperNICs or NVIDIA Quantum-2 InfiniBand-based networks, and a choice of HPC storage. Oracle and NVIDIA are delivering accelerated computing and generative AI services that help organizations build and maintain sovereign AI models in their country or retain AI-generated data with strong data residency controls. OCI Compute based on NVIDIA L40S GPUs, NVIDIA Hopper architecture GPUs, and NVIDIA Blackwell platforms are now orderable to support sovereign AI deployments. NVIDIA Omniverse, a platform for developing OpenUSD applications for industrial digitalization and generative physical AI, is validated on OCI and available to support many developer use cases, including sovereign AI. A new OCI Dedicated Region configuration—Dedicated Region25—will be available in a smaller, scalable size starting at only three racks and rapidly deployable within weeks. Dedicated Region25 has a 75 percent smaller launch footprint and simplified datacenter requirements, supports OCI’s 150+ AI and cloud services and allows a wider range of customers to gain the agility, economics, and scale of the public cloud in their own datacenters. The new configuration will be available in the next calendar year. OCI enables customers to combine cloud services from multiple clouds to optimize cost, functionality, and performance. With Oracle Database@AWS, Oracle Database@Azure, and Oracle Database@Google Cloud, customers gain direct access to Oracle Database services running on OCI and deployed directly in the datacenters of the four largest hyperscalers. Through these partnerships, customer have the flexibility to run their applications across clouds and combine all the benefits of Oracle Database services with services from other cloud providers for a seamless multicloud experience. In addition, customer benefit from the simplicity, security, and low latency of a unified operating environment. OCI Roving Edge Infrastructure enhancements support remote AI inferencing: New versions of the OCI Roving Edge Device, including a new three-GPU option optimized for AI, are now generally available to help customers leverage remote AI inferencing at the edge. This enables customers to manage mission-critical data at the edge and run domain-specific LLMs or computer vision even in remote or disconnected locations. OCI Roving Edge Infrastructure consists of multiple configurations of ruggedized and portable high-performance devices, weighing less than 35 lb. (without the case), equipped with 56 cores (102 virtual CPUs), 512 GB of RAM, and up to 123 TB of storage. HeatWave delivers new GenAI and multicloud capabilities: New HeatWave capabilities and innovations help organizations easily and securely take advantage of generative AI both in OCI and Amazon Web Services (AWS). Additional new capabilities help customers quickly and securely implement lakehouse and machine learning applications for a wider variety of use cases, as well as help improve the performance and manageability of transactional applications. New OCI Generative AI innovations help customers turn data into a competitive advantage: OCI Generative AI (GenAI) Agents with retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) capabilities and enhanced Oracle AI innovations are now generally available. The new capabilities help customers turn their data into a competitive advantage by making it easier to apply AI to real-world business operations.  👉  News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. © 2022-2023

Title: Product Review: mTap Digital Business Card
Article Content: Gone are the days when business networking relied heavily on traditional paper business cards. The world is rapidly embracing digital solutions, and the mTap Digital Business Card is leading the charge as a modern alternative. Designed for today's fast-paced, tech-savvy professionals, the mTap Digital Business Card offers a sleek and efficient way to manage your networking needs. We recently received the mTap Digital Business Card with premium membership, and here’s a detailed review based on real-time experience: NFC (Near Field Communication) operates through innovative wireless communication technology when brought close to a compatible device. This tool harnesses a technique similar to infrared (IR) which was once used to transfer data from one device to another in older mobile phones. The same NFC technique is used in gaming controllers and headphones to enhance compatibility with paired devices. The mTap Digital Business Card works by drawing it closer to the NFC-enabled smartphones. After tapping it on your phone, a notification pops up, and then all the business-related contact details appear on the mobile screen, containing the address, company name, designation, social media links on all registered portals, and work-related links at the receiving end. This also allows you to share your WhatsApp contact details. The analytics of this card enables its users to check the number of viewers of a profile. The card is customizable according to your brand’s colour and style to enhance your digital identity. With just a single tap and within 60 seconds via the QR code on the back, the card is all set for seamless digital professional networking. The mTap hub is designed to efficiently organize, connect, and manage contacts and interactions right from your command center. You can easily add a widget and scan a business card or another mTap card to retrieve the details. This allows you to create and manage multiple profiles for different businesses. On non-NFC enabled devices, you can use the QR code at mTap card’s back and obtain details All the contact information is easily manageable through CRM Setting up an mTap profile is easy to navigate. Simply download the app from the App Store or Play Store, then choose one of your preferred sign-up options from email, Google, Apple, or LinkedIn. After signing up, you'll be prompted to build your profile and add your website. Click "continue," and then select "yes" to allow the AI to automatically pull your LinkedIn profile, profile picture, logo, and social media handles. mTap automatically applies your brand colors to your profile by analyzing the logo. Then edit your profile to include pictures, contact details, calendar links, presentations, brochures, images, videos, text, and other links you wish to share with your prospects. In the "Manage Links" section, mTap allows adding and organizing all necessary links. The profile can be previewed by tapping on the 'Preview' option. To update your mTap account, go to the 'Main Profile' section to revise your personal and professional details. The premium membership truly elevates the mTap experience, unlocking a host of additional features that go beyond basic networking. With this membership, users can save contacts, making follow-ups and relationship management easier. Additionally, the ability to save the location where you met someone adds a unique touch, helping to contextualize connections. These features, make the premium membership a valuable investment for serious networkers looking to maximize their professional interactions. Using the mTap Digital Business Card was a seamless experience, blending innovation with practicality. The instant access to contact details and the ability to share them effortlessly left a lasting impression. The card’s customizable features allowed us to tailor the experience to reflect our brand identity, making every interaction feel personalized and professional. Overall, the mTap Digital Business Card delivered on its promise of modernizing business networking in an efficient and user-friendly way. mTap Business Card costs a one-time payment of ₹2500. In case, if the card is broken, you have to make another purchase. Other additional services are available with the purchase which can increase or decrease the price from the given range. With just a single tap on the phone, all your details are shared, which is quite commendable. The mTap Business Card is gaining popularity through word-of-mouth, and we were eager to experience the seamless sharing of professional information. After evaluating its functionality and effectiveness, we rate the mTap Business Card at 4 out of 5 stars. This score reflects its impressive ease of use and potential for enhancing networking  👉  News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. © 2022-2023

Title: Product Review: Marshall Motif II ANC
Article Content: The ease of use that a hands-free earbud delivers is unmatched as this gadget not only uplifts your music listening and calling experience rather, enhances your style statement as well. Today, we're diving into the Marshall Motif II ANC TWS Earbuds, a pair that promises to deliver not just stellar audio but also an elevated listening experience with advanced active noise cancellation. Read the complete review to uncover every minute detail about this product in the most honest and experienced way. Keep reading. The Marshall Motif II ANC earbuds offer exceptional sound quality, in a compact package. With an enhanced design that allows for hours of comfortable use, whether during a short session or a marathon listening experience, these earbuds are crafted for those who value both form and function. Featuring the iconic Marshall M logo on the buds, Motif II ANC combines rugged durability, making sure you’re always prepared for travel. Compared to the predecessor, the latest Motif II ANC model is poised to deliver 10 hours longer playtime. With the charging case, you can enjoy up to 30 hours of listening with ANC activated and a remarkable 43 hours without it. At the same time, it delivers 6 hours of playtime on its own with ANC and 9 hours sans ANC This extended battery life ensures you can go longer without needing to recharge. In addition, the active noise cancellation technology improves the listening experience as considerably eliminates background noise. To charge the Marshall Motif II ANC earbuds, simply place them in the case for a boost. The charging case features LED lights that indicate the current battery level and let you know when the battery is fully charged. If you're in a hurry, the quick charging feature is a lifesaver, providing up to 1 hour of playtime with just a 15-minute charge. For prolonged battery life, customize the limitations levels in the settings for charging such as max charge limit, temperature limit, and charging speed, and get a longer battery lifetime. These adjustments help ensure that your earbuds enjoy a prolonged battery life, keeping them ready for your next listening session. The earbuds take connectivity to the next level with Bluetooth LE Audio technology. This ensures a robust and future-proof connection, providing you with the best possible audio experience without interruptions. These earbuds can be paired with two devices simultaneously, allowing you to switch between them effortlessly. Once connected, the Motif II ANC takes full advantage of the latest Bluetooth advancements, ensuring a seamless and reliable connection that keeps your music and calls crystal clear, no matter which device you're using. One of the standout features of the Marshall Motif II ANC earbuds is the Marshall Bluetooth App, which unlocks a range of advanced functionalities. Through this app, you can personalize your listening experience by fine-tuning your EQ settings, adjusting the ANC levels, and managing software updates to keep your device running with the latest enhancements. Apart from leveraging extra features, it facilitates accessing the App Store, and Google Play, and managing updates. However, no app is required to connect the headphones with the device as it can be paired independently. One of the groundbreaking features of the Marshall Motif II ANC is the Transparency mode, which allows its users to be more aware while traveling on the road. This means it enables you to keep track of your surroundings while you are talking and walking outside and ensure your safety. Additionally, the Ear Detect feature utilizes built-in sensors to detect when the earbuds are in or out of your ears. This smart functionality automatically pauses your audio when you remove the earbuds and resumes playback when you put them back in, providing a seamless listening experience without any interruptions. Connecting the Marshall Motif II ANC earbuds to the devices follow these simple steps: Open the device case. Press and hold the button until the blue light pulses Find your headphones from the Bluetooth list popping up in the device’s Bluetooth list Download the Marshall Bluetooth App on your device, follow the on-screen instructions, and finish the setup. Ready to use The Marshall Motif II ANC earbuds are available for purchase at ₹19,999 on Amazon. The Marshall Motif II ANC has several innovative features that enable us to customize the buds according to our preferences. Another impressive feature is the ANC control and transparency mode that is introduced keeping road safety on point, which is quite commendable. The compatibility with the two devices kept us busy at work and meanwhile enjoying music to keep work pressure at bay. Our team at DT thoroughly enjoyed the review process and found the earbuds to deliver on their promises. As a result, DT gives the Marshall Motif II ANC a solid thumbs up with a rating of 4 out of 5.  👉  News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. © 2022-2023

Title: Product Review - ASUS Zenbook DUO 2024
Article Content: Multi-screen laptops are groundbreaking innovations designed to enhance productivity and user experience by incorporating multiple displays. This time, our experts at the DT got to review the ASUS Zenbook DUO 2024, a double-screen laptop with the convenience of a detachable keyboard. Read the complete review to know our experience and findings with this device. The ASUS Zenbook DUO 2024 harnesses the goodness of a double screen to multiply the workspace. The laptop boasts a display with 180° lay-flat hinge, enabling content sharing during presentations and business meetings. Both the panels measure 14” FHD+ (1920 x 1200) OLED touchscreen with a 16:10 aspect ratio for enhanced productivity. In addition, the 100% DCI-P3 color gamut delivers more accurate and vibrant graphics essential for demanding tasks like editing, and graphic designing, and the high 1,000,000:1 contrast ratio provides a more dynamic and immersive viewing experience, while 91% screen-to-body ratio maximizes display area. Also, the display is Pantone-validated and qualifies for Dolby Vision Display HDR, and True Black 500 certification, making it perfect for professional work and content consumption. Besides, the 0.2ms response time and 60Hz refresh rate offer faster pixel transition and smoothened content consumption. Also, the 500-nit peak brightness enhances brightness in a bright environment, while being a TUV Rheinland-certified SGS-Eye-Care Display, it reduces blue light omission and minimizes glare and reflection issues. The laptop comes with an integrated double-hinged kickstand, simplifying usage in sharing mode, dual-screen mode, desktop mode, or laptop mode as per the use case. Instead of an all-metal build, it is very portable as 14.6mm thin and weighs just 1.35 kg weight without the keyboard and 1.65kg with the keyboard. The Zenbook DUO comes loaded with a wide selection of intuitive software features, aiming at elevating the handling experience and offering comfort right to your fingertips. Plus, the OLED touchscreen bolsters intuitive gestures, including swiping with six fingers to acknowledge the virtual keyboard, swiping out with five fingers to maximize the active window, a three-finger tap on the virtual touchpad, etc. The device boasts innovative redesigned ScreenXpert features, like App Navigator, App Switcher, Microphone Switcher, Sharing Mode, Control Centre, Motion Wallpaper, Brightness, etc. With up to Intel Core Ultra 9 Processor 185H with a maximum processing speed of up to 5.1GHz, 16Cores, and 22Threads that successfully manage multitasking. While Intel Arc iGPU facilitates improved graphical tasks. In addition, the Intel AI Boost NPU accelerates AI-related workloads. Besides, the “Advanced Cooling System” is designed to efficiently manage the heat produced by both the CPU and GPU in a device; which can handle the combined thermal load of up to 35 watts to ensure safe temperature during longer working hours. Also, the Intel Evo certification marks the quality, long battery life, reliable performance, and advanced connectivity of the Zenbook DUO The device operates at a high frequency of 7467 MHz using the LPDDR5X standard. The high 32GB RAM allows for multitasking and faster data access while handling memory-seeking applications such as gaming. Meanwhile, the M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 SSD used in the device provides up to 2TB of storage space allowing for storing a substantial amount of data, including operating systems, applications, and user files, and faster data access and transfer. The device leverages the potential for a 75Wh battery and uninterruptedly lasts for up to 13 hours in the charger in a single stretch depending on the usage. The system boasts a USB-PD fast-charging feature that bolsters for a quick recharge of the battery via Type-C charger support. The combination offers efficient charging convenient and long-lasting power. Also, the 65W adapter is provided to support charging ASUS Pen Stylus. The Zenbook DUO keyboard offers an unmatched typing experience due to 19.5 mm pitch, 1.4 mm key travel, 19.05 mm pitch, and 0.3 mm dish-shaped indentation akin to a desktop PC. The keyboard is detachable, backlit full-sized, and comes along with a responsive touchpad measuring 74mm in width, 129.7 mm in length, and 0.23 mm in travel distance for easy navigation. Also, the dual-mode keyboard features pogo pins as connectors for clamshell use to attach both keyboards to functionalize every feature while using both the screens and wireless Bluetooth capabilities for increased display usage. This design allows the keyboard to connect directly and reliably when the device is in clamshell mode and to function wirelessly when using the device in a multi-screen setup. The  provides a comprehensive range of ports including 2 Thunderbolt four ports for 100W power, and 40Gb/s data, alongside external 4K displays, one USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-A, one full-size HDMI 2.1, and one 3.5mm combo-audio-jack. Also, the model offers rich connectivity options due to the latest 5.3 Bluetooth, 6E Wi-Fi, and ASUS Smart Connect. The system also bolsters a USB-PD-supported fast charging with a Type-C charger. The laptop comes with ASUS Pen 2.0 Stylus input support that is equally supportive on both screens with 4,096 pressure levels. The Stylus enables users to input text using a finger or included ASUS Pen stylus to adhere to the handwriting feature of this model. It is compatible with any application that requires typing or text entry and artistic work. The dual-screen laptop possesses an FHD 3DNR IR webcam that delivers high-quality video required for video calls and recordings. With the IR Webcam Windows Hello support, the device supports facial recognition or a fingerprint scan for logging in in any light condition. Also, the 3DNR technique reduces noise and graininess in low-light conditions for better image quality. For audio, the ASUS Zenbook DUO 2024 features a built-in array microphone, and a Harman Kardon, Dolby Atmos sound system alongside 2 built-in Stereo speakers. Also, the Smart AMP amplifies the sound output to 350% louder without distortion, while the Audio Booster enhances the listening experience. The two-way ASUS-AiSense-Noise-Canceling-Technology utilizes AI for more effective noise cancellation for an immersive call quality during meetings. The ASUS Zenbook DUO 2024 is available to purchase at a starting price of Rs. 1,59,990. Also, it comes with a subscription to Adobe Creative Cloud for three months and MS Office 2021. Reviexwing the ASUS Zenbook DUO 2024 was a totally good experience as this system provides a double screen that straightaway helps in several workloads requiring two windows for simultaneous tasking, content consumption, gaming, and more. We must mention the quick key is quite considerable which enables us to create our hot keys and increase efficiency. This laptop is a package of multiple innovative features that enhance the overall work experience. On a scale of 5, DT rates it 4.5.  👉  News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. © 2022-2023

Title: Samsung Launches Affordable and Stylish Galaxy M05 Smartphone in India
Article Content: Samsung, announced the launch of Galaxy M05, a dynamic addition to its popular Galaxy M series. Made for those who seek outstanding camera capabilities and immersive viewing experience, Galaxy M05 offers a perfect blend of high-performance and affordability. “Galaxy M05 is designed for young consumers who demand more from their smartphones. With features like a 50MP dual camera, a long-lasting 5000mAh battery with 25W fast charging, and a stunning 6.7” HD+ display, the device promises an immersive entertainment and enhanced camera experience. With these stand out features, Galaxy M05 is sure to set a new benchmark among the entry-level smartphones,” said  . Galaxy M05 takes smartphone photography to the next level with its dual camera setup. The high-resolution 50MP wide-angle lens captures vibrant, detailed photos, even in low-light conditions with aperture F/1.8, while the 2MP depth-sensing camera delivers pictures with enhanced clarity. The 8MP front camera ensures your selfies are crisp and clear. Galaxy M05 features a massive 5000mAh battery that easily powers through long usage. Whether you are streaming, gaming, or binge watching, the 25W fast charging feature ensures you are back in action in no time. Galaxy M05 features a large 6.7” HD+ display which is perfect for binge-watching your favourite shows or scrolling through social media feeds. The expansive screen also ensures an immersive viewing experience, catering to the needs of tech-savvy Gen Z customers. Powered by the MediaTek Helio G85 processor, Galaxy M05 is built to handle demanding tasks with ease. The reliable processor allows for seamless multitasking, enabling users to run multiple apps without any lag. Galaxy M05 will be available in 4GB+64GB storage variant, expandable upto 1TB storage for those who need more space. The device comes in a sleek Mint Green colour, reflecting a quirky and modern design aesthetic. Galaxy M05 will be available on Amazon, Samsung.com and at select retail stores.   👉  News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. © 2022-2023

Title: Oracle’s New Fusion Cloud CX Features Offer Enhanced Collaboration and Efficiency
Article Content: Oracle announced new capabilities within Oracle Fusion Cloud Customer Experience (CX) that give buyers self-service access to a unified and active view of their commercial relationship with an organization. The latest updates provide buying groups and selling teams with a collaborative commerce solution that delivers a view of quotes, orders, account and contact profiles, subscriptions, renewals, and assets to help drive better outcomes and revenue throughout the life of a business relationship. “By unifying buying, selling, ordering, and billing flows across the organization, we’re enabling enterprise organizations to bring new value to their customers as they build better long-term relationships,” said  . “We’ve spent the last year folding our industry-leading Commerce offering into our unified revenue transformation solution, so now our customers can easily activate a buying channel that handles all the complexities of B2B selling.” The new digital buying experience connects processes and data from customer experience and financial applications in Oracle’s revenue transformation solution to support increasingly sophisticated go-to-market models such as recurring revenue, usage-based, and consumption-based strategies. New use cases include: Self-service access: Helps organizations engage with buyer groups through shared access to quotes, orders, account and contact profiles, subscriptions, and renewals. Assisted buying experiences: Empowers buying groups to engage with selling teams and find a solution to their needs by evaluating product fit, negotiating pricing or terms, or assistance with placing orders. Full-service sales engagements: Empowers sellers to engage buyers with an intelligent, interactive buying experience from sharing quotes and content all the way through onboarding a new account. Generative AI for contract summarization: Helps organizations reduce contract processing time and close deals faster by providing quick answers to contract-related questions, helping sellers and buying groups to track important milestones and obligations, and enables better internal oversight. Generative AI for sellers: Helps sellers quickly capitalize on sales opportunities and efficiently engage with buyers to drive further account expansion by drafting emails, activity summaries, sales executive briefings, and executive summaries for quotes and proposals. Unified CPQ, contracts, and order management: Helps organizations increase the speed and accuracy of transactions, manage complex enterprise sales agreements, and honor pre-negotiated terms during the ordering process by unifying contract management, order management, subscription management and configure, price, and quote (CPQ) capabilities in Oracle Cloud CX. “Revenue leaders are challenged with keeping up with what customers need, when they need it, and how they want to buy it. It gets even more challenging when managing multiple revenue streams, channels, and products,” said  . “It’s great to see Oracle consistently investing in its CX solutions that are now able to make B2B buying much easier, better the experience, and ultimately increase revenue.”  👉  News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. © 2022-2023

Title: Oracle Launches Fusion Cloud Sustainability to Drive Efficient Reporting
Article Content: Oracle announced Oracle Fusion Cloud Sustainability, a new application within Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications Suite that helps organizations efficiently manage and report on sustainability initiatives. Offered to customers at no additional cost, Oracle Fusion Cloud Sustainability provides business leaders with a flexible framework to capture and analyze critical sustainability data to enhance reporting, expand insights, improve decision-making, and accelerate progress towards environmental goals. “Customers consistently tell us that the greatest barrier to understanding their environmental impact is the time and complexity required to chase down, organize, and analyze the necessary data,” said  . “With Oracle Fusion Cloud Sustainability, customers can eliminate these challenges, efficiently align data with the latest regional guidelines, automate sustainability reporting processes, improve decision-making, and accelerate progress on their sustainability goals.” Oracle Fusion Cloud Sustainability integrates data from Oracle Fusion Cloud Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and Oracle Fusion Cloud Supply Chain & Manufacturing (SCM) enabling analysis and reporting within Oracle Fusion Cloud Enterprise Performance Management (EPM) and Oracle Fusion Data Intelligence. With Oracle Fusion Cloud Sustainability, business leaders benefit from: Automated transaction records: Enable business leaders to increase the speed, accuracy, and transparency of sustainability reporting by using AI, classification rules, and sustainability metadata attributes to automatically create activity records and add transactions to a sustainability ledger. Contextualized data: Enables business leaders to gain the context needed to drive impactful decisions by allowing them to view the operational data in Oracle Cloud ERP, Oracle Cloud EPM, and Oracle Cloud SCM so they can see assets, processes, suppliers, or products that need attention. Prebuilt dashboards: Enable business leaders to gain a holistic view of sustainability performance and drill down into the underlying details to inform next steps by automatically exporting data to sustainability dashboards with prebuilt KPIs and custom analyses in Oracle Fusion Data Intelligence. Rigorous audit and traceability capabilities: Enable business leaders to improve report accuracy and transparency by providing financial-grade audit traceability and tamper-proof ledger entries that deliver a full record of all activities and events with sustainability impact, along with any associated emissions. Sophisticated emission factor mapping: Enables business leaders to calculate their organizations’ carbon footprint and obtain a more thorough understanding of the environmental impact of business decisions. Business leaders can also automatically calculate emissions for any type of activity using representative values (emission factors) and comparisons (global warming potentials) and perform the required conversion of units of measure and currency. Comprehensive integrations: Enable business leaders to streamline data collection from third-party applications and track activity needed to meet reporting requirements by importing activity data directly from external sources via REST APIs and spreadsheets. Oracle Fusion Applications Suite enables organizations to take advantage of the cloud and the latest advancements in AI to break down organizational silos, standardize processes, and manage finance, HR, supply chain, and customer experience data on a single integrated cloud platform. With updates delivered every quarter, Oracle Fusion Applications Suite helps organizations embrace continuous innovation and stay ahead of whatever comes next.  👉  News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. © 2022-2023

Title: Product Review: HP Spectre x360 14
Article Content: The HP Spectre x360 14-inch is a stylish and versatile 2-in-1 device, perfect for a range of scenarios thanks to its portability. Its lightweight and convertible design make it an excellent choice for frequent travelers and business professionals. For a thorough and unbiased assessment, check out our detailed review by the DT. Read on to discover more. The HP Spectre x360 14 boasts a practical, premium design with a minimalist aesthetic. The laptop’s metal construction not only adds a fantastic finish but also ensures durability. This AI-powered 360-degree convertible laptop is available in three stunning color options—Slate Blue, Sahara Silver, and Nightfall Black—all featuring a glossy finish. Weighing just 1.34 kg, it’s lightweight and portable, making it perfect for on-the-go use. The included rechargeable stylus, which magnetically attaches to the laptop’s side, adds to its convenience. The design features an accent finish on the corners for added protection, while the more rectangular shape offers a sleek, sophisticated look with pared-down luxury. The hinge is engraved with 'Spectre' for branding, and dual speakers are positioned on both sides of the laptop for enhanced audio quality. The HP Spectre x360 14 is designed to boost productivity, making it ideal for both office use and entertainment. It features a stunning 2.8k OLED display with a 14-inch diagonal size, offering vibrant visuals. The touchscreen capability allows you to use it as a tablet, with multitouch support and a fast 48-120 Hz refresh rate, plus a 0.2 ms response time for quick and smooth input. The micro-edge anti-reflection Corning glass, combined with a low blue light feature, helps protect your eyes during long working hours. With SDR 400 nits and HDR 500 nits brightness, the display delivers true-to-life colors and sharp, bright images, ensuring an immersive viewing experience. The HP Spectre comes equipped with an HP Wide Vision 9MP IR camera, complete with a camera shutter for added privacy, ensuring you avoid accidental visual contact during video calls. The 9-megapixel resolution provides bright, clear images with minimal noise, and it includes features to blur or replace your background as needed. The camera also adapts seamlessly to various lighting conditions. For audio, the Poly Studio setup includes two front-firing woofers and two top-firing tweeters, delivering a more immersive and balanced listening experience. Whether for music or gaming, this audio system enhances your experience with rich, clear sound. The full-size backlit keyboard on the HP Spectre offers a single color with ideal key travel, ensuring a comfortable typing experience. The smooth touchpad is responsive and easily supports multiple gestures, enhancing productivity. Additionally, the magnetic stylus is a valuable tool for content creators and digital art designers, enabling them to work with precise detail and accuracy. The HP Spectre x360 14-inch offers versatile connectivity options, including two Thunderbolt 4 ports with a 40Gbps signaling rate, one USB Type-C port, and one USB Type-A port with a 10Gbps signaling rate. Additionally, it features a headphone jack for audio needs. The laptop also comes with a Type-C connector that includes one HDMI port and two USB Type-A ports, providing even more flexibility for connecting devices and peripherals. The HP Spectre x360 14 is powered by the robust Intel Core Ultra 7 155H processor and runs on the Windows 11 Home 64 operating system, ensuring smooth and efficient performance. It comes equipped with 32 GB of LPDDR5x-6400 MHz RAM for seamless multitasking and a 1 TB PCIe NVMe TLC M.2 SSD for ample and fast storage. The laptop also features the latest Bluetooth 5.4 technology and supports Wi-Fi 7, providing advanced connectivity options for an enhanced user experience. The HP Spectre x360 14 is available at a price of ₹1,64,999, reflecting its premium build, advanced features, and powerful performance. The HP Spectre x360 14 has earned a 5/5 rating from DT. After thoroughly testing and using the laptop across various departments for over 30 days, we can confidently say that it’s an ideal solution for people on the go. At our DT office, we closely monitored its speed, performance, and all its features, and we found its overall performance to be highly satisfactory. Whether for work, creativity, or entertainment, the Spectre x360 14 consistently delivered on all fronts, making it a standout choice for professionals and tech enthusiasts alike.  👉  News Dot Media Pvt. Ltd. © 2022-2023

Title: Uživo Zvezda - Zenit, uživo prenos meča - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
Faul u napadu pravi Spelmen, u bloku je bio previše čvrst i srušio je Jaga Mateuša. Napad uzima Zvezda. Kenan ide na prodor, ali promašuje novi pokušaj nečega što je ličilo na flouter. Bejkon uzima pretežak šut i dolazi do dva poena. Daum ide prelepo na prodor po prijemu lopte, polaže i pogađa. Pokušava Kenan ponovo za tri poena, ali opet promašuje, Zvezda trenutno ima 0/7 sa distance. Veoma čvrsto se igra, ali sudije ne dopuštaju to i brzo se prave faulovi. Jago pokreće prvi napadm, lopta do Plavšića, ali odbrana je iskočila i uradila dobar posao. Daum diže sa jedne noge u padu i pogađa poludistancu preko ruke. Zaharov pravi faul na Kenanu koji je ukrao loptu za dobar kontranapad. Bio je poslednji igrač odbrane i napravio je faul sa leđa. Precizan Kenan oba puta. Fauliran je Davidovac i imaće dva nova bacanja, a faul je nesportski, tako da će nakon toga imati i loptu sa strane. Precitan je samo u drugom pokušaju. Faul na Kenanu pravi Mun, dosta jak faul Muna. Nova bacanja, dosta loš ritam utakmice. Precizan Kenan sa bacanja oba puta. Spelman diže, pa promašuje trojku, Miler-Mekintajer ide na zakucavanje i odlično. Izgleda da su pukle arkade. Bilo je i krvi. Jedan igrač Zenita je morao da napusti teren. Lopta stiže do Plavšića od Kodija i nova dva laka poena. Kalinić uzima flouter preko ruke, ali promašuje. Mun ide u solo napad protiv Dauma i fauliran je Amerikanac. Zenit će imati dva slobodna bacanja. Mun pogađa svoje prvo slobodno bacanje u četvrtom pokušaju na ovom meču. Plavšić dobija odličan pas i dodatno slobodno bacanje će imati nakon pogotka preko ruke. To pogađa Uroš. Greši Kodi u kontranapadu, prekombinovao je sa Davidovcem. Sada izbacuje loptu na tri poena za Davidovca, ali ovaj promašuje taj šut. Pojtres postiže laka dva poena i tako vraća Zenit na samo poen zaostatka. Ide tajmaut Janisa Sferopulosa. Andrej Kostić ulazi na teren, dobija priliku. Bejkon solira, šutira za tri preko ruke, ali promašuje. Kodi ide u kontranapad, predvodi driblingom i fauliran je na pokušaju polaganja. Precizan oba puta sa slobodnog bacanja. Zvezda ponovo vodi. Kalinić od lopte pravi novi faul, lopta sa strane za Zenit. Još jedan faul, ovog puta za Mitrovića. Kostić dobija loptu, ide na prodor i faulira ga odbrana Zenita, dobio je udarac po ruci od Ružnjova. Sa penala je precizan oba puta. Kostić iz izlazne kretnje dobija pas od Kalinića, ali promašuje solidan šut za tri. Novi faul Zenita, ne mogu da zaustave Mekintajera, biće slobodna bacanja pri sledećoj ličnoj greški. Mitrović na pas Mekintajera poentira levom rukom na drugi obruč. Dobrić trči do koša, pravi roling, ali promašuje polaganje. Mun pravi faul na Mitroviću za dva slobodna bacanja, morao je da ga spreči da prvotimac Zvezde ne postigne lake poene. Promašuje prvo bacanje Luka Mitrović, ali je drugi put precizniji. Mekintajer organizuje novi napa, pas za Kalinića, pa napadom u trouglu lopta ide do Mitrovića za laka dva poena. Diže i pogađa trojku ekipa Zenita, a onda na drugoj strani Zvezda vraća za dva. Jago pokreće novi napad nakon dobre odbrane, ali flouterom promašuje ceo koš i lopta je opet za Zenit. Za sada Zvezda ne briljira, ne igraju loše, ali fale dobri napad i dobre odluke. Rampa Mitrovića, Kodi ulazi u kontranapad, lopta do Dobrića i biće dva slobodna bacanja. Precizan je oba puta. Novi kontranapad vodi Kodi i faulira ga Hanter, lopta je sa strane. Gube loptu, Hanter je krade i ide na zakucavanje. Nezgodan pad za Trenta Frejžera, nakon čega se držao za vrat i morao je da napusti teren. Dosta je ugruvan bivši igrač FMP-a. Dobio je dva bacanja, ali šutiraće neko drugi, precizni su oba puta. Odlična igra između Dobrića i Mitrovića, kombinacija i dupli pasovi dali su laka dva poena. Mitrović igra protiv Hantera, ali zbunio se i van balansa promašio. Mitrović ponovo dobija loptu na niski post od Jaga i precizan je nakon jednog promašaja. Novi poeni za Muna, ne može odbrana crveno-belih da ih zaustavi. Jago ostaje sam na šutu za tri poena, da završi prvu četvrtinu, ali šut je ostao kratak i promašio je ceo obruč. Pogađa Kodi šut za Zvezdu preko dva igrača za dva poena. Težak, ali prelep šut. Odlična odbrana Zvezde, Mun izbacuje loptu u aut greškom. Jago je na terenu, lopta do Dobrića, on ulazi u pik sa Daumom, ali ovaj promašuje šut. Bejkon napada, ali neće moći preko Kalinića. Jago u piku sa Mitrovićem, ali promašuje zicer Luka levom rukom. Spelman do Muna i laka dva poena za Zenit. Kalinić do Mitrovića u reket, lopta dalje do Dobrića, ali sudija svira tri sekunde u reketu za Luku Mitrovića. Ostaje Pojtres ispod koša sam nakon ispadanja odbrane Zvezde i dolazi lako do dva poena. Faul Bejkona, lopta je sa strane za crveno-bele, Lazić ostaje sam na poludistanci i precizan je. Spelmen vraća dva poena. Daum fintira na drugoj strani i uspeo je da izvuče faul, imaće slobodna bacanja. Precizan je oba puta Majk Daum. Bejkon igra protiv Lazića, a ovaj ga faulira i šalje na liniju penala. Lazić napušta teren, drugi faul, a Bejkon je oba puta precizan sa linije penala. Spelman ne koristi sa polu odstojanja. Plavšić na drugoj strani gura Pojtresa ispod koša, ali promašuje. Fauliran je ponovo Miler-Mekintajer i pogađa oba bacanja. Dvejn Bejkon pokreće novi napad, ali Zvezda krade loptu na trenutak, da bi je potom izgubili i usledilo atraktivno zakucavanje. Kodi dodaje do Plavšića, koji na divan način podiže Pojtresa i postiže dva poena. Omari Spelmenu ispada lopta, a onda nakon ofanzivnog skoka dolaze igrači Zenita ipak do poena. Mekintajer ostaje na poludistanci i promašuje šut.  Novi napad Kenan koristi sa daleke trojke, ali lopta izlazi iz koša. Zvezda odlično otvara meč, Daum prodire ka košu i dobija loptu od Mekintajera za dva laka poena. Plavšić već u sledećem napadu igra leđima, okreće i šutira fejdavej, ali promašuje. Zenit već treći napad zaredom ne uspeva da iskoristi, pritom Pojtres pravi faul na Kodiju, koji je prvi stigao do koša. Kenan ide na prodor na polaganje i promašuje, a onda Kodi pravi faul na niskom postu da spreči lagane poene, ali daje dva slobodna bacanja. Pogađa Zenit oba bacanja. Prenos meča je obezbedila televizija Arena Sport, a utakmica će biti emitovana na kanalu Arena Sport Premium 3. Pošaljite nam Vaše snimke, fotografije i priče na broj telefona   (  /   /  ). Title: Policajac zaustavio ovu lepoticu, video da je malo popila: Ubrzo je shvatio ko je ona, pa pozvao pojačanje - Vesti - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
. Ona je navodno prisvojila predmete od dvoje turista, a otkrivena je nakon što je vozila bez registarskih tablica na Las Vegas Stripu kada ju je zaustavila policija. Policajac je uhapsio Kasandru Tovar (31), nakon nakon što je primetio da ona vozi automobil bez registarskih tablica i  . Proveravajući informacije saznali su da je tražena zbog krađe i drugih optužbi. Kako se navodi u dokumentima čovek je 23. aprila 2023. pozvao policiju rekavši da je žrtva krađe. On je rekao da su on i još jedan muškarac boravili u MGM Signature Tovers-u kada su sreli tri žene u baru i da su kasnije prešli u svoju sobu.  Oštećeni joj je navodno rekao da ne plaća za seks. Nastavili su da razgovaraju napolju na balkonu i jedna žena mu je donela piće u čaši,  Muškarci su se kasnije probudili i otkrili da su im sav nakit, kao i drugi vredni predmeti nestali. Toksikološki test je kasnije pokazao različite supstance u uzorku. Policija je pronašla snimak nadzornih kamera i automobil registrovan na jednu od žena, a ona je kasnije priznala da je pila sa muškarcima i da je krala nakit. . Nakon hapšenja te žene, policija je locirala Kasandru Tovar  Policija je pokušala da kontaktira Kasandru Tovara, ali nije uspela. Sudija je tada potpisao nalog za njeno hapšenje. Tokom njenog prvog pojavljivanja pred sudom, sudija suda u Las Vegasu, Daniel Vestmeier, odredio je kauciju od 20.000 dolara.  Dve druge žene suočavaju se sa optužbama za krađu 2023. godine. Title: Oracle’s Latest Dynamic Skills Capabilities Enhance Talent Strategy and Decision-Making
Article Content: Oracle announced a new open skills architecture within Oracle Dynamic Skills that helps organizations to develop, curate, and execute an enterprise-wide skills-based talent strategy. Part of Oracle Fusion Cloud Human Capital Management (HCM), Oracle Dynamic Skills helps organizations—regardless of where they are on their skills journey—better understand and leverage the skills of their employees, expand access to talent, and make smarter workforce decisions. “Skills are quickly becoming the primary metric to understanding the capabilities of an organization. Having a skills-based talent strategy can help an organization uncover critical work and workforce insights, tap into more diverse talent, and maximize performance. But many organizations don’t know where to start in their skills journey,” said  . “With Oracle Dynamic Skills, we are making it easy for our customers to manage their skills data—whether they are just getting started on their skills journey or looking to enhance their existing skills data. By providing the intelligence, applications, and architecture, we enable our customers to better align their skills with business priorities, optimize their workforce, and future-proof their organization in a rapidly evolving job market.” Oracle Dynamic Skills enables organizations to manage skills data at its core, alongside its work and people data, for improved insights and data-driven decisions. With a complete view of skills woven into processes across the enterprise, an organization can optimize its workforce performance by making better internal hires, fostering career development, enhancing planning and budgeting, improving skills-based scheduling, and developing highly skilled employees aligned with business needs. The new open skills architecture within Oracle Dynamic Skills includes: AI-powered bespoke skills inventory: Enables HR leaders to gain a complete catalog of their organization’s skills that can be modified or refined, and is always kept up to date. As a result, HR leaders can help their organization enhance the speed and accuracy of skills insights by improving data consistency and relevance. AI-powered data enrichment: Enables HR leaders to combine enriched skills data with data from across the enterprise and third-party sources. As a result, HR leaders can help their organization gain more value from the tools and data they already have, and benefit from AI features that expand skills insights to better align talent with business priorities. Skills library: Enables HR leaders to jumpstart their skills journey with an extensive pre-populated skills library to augment existing skills data or serve as a starting point. As a result, HR leaders can help theliir organization accelerate adoption of a skills-based talent strategy and improve workforce decision-making. Skills data analysis: Enables HR leaders to analyze their workforce’s skills strengths, gaps, and trends with flexible and easy-to-use business intelligence tools. As a result, HR leaders can help their organization nurture the right skills and quickly fill skills gaps. Integrated skills intelligence: Enables HR leaders to seamlessly leverage third-party skills data and labor market analytics, such as those from Lightcast, a provider of trusted global labor market data, analytics, and expert guidance. As a result, HR leaders can help their organization expand insights and make more informed talent decisions. Skills curation and management: Enables HR leaders to browse, add, and modify skills with intuitive tools to further refine and personalize their skills library. As a result, HR leaders can help their organization better manage and define their skills needs. Multiple language support: Enables HR leaders to engage with skills data in any of the 30 delivered languages, as well as translate skills data in additional languages as needed for their global organization. As a result, HR leaders can help their organization adopt workforce insights across its entire global operations and further enhance workforce performance. “Building a strong skills foundation is a top priority for us at Navy Federal Credit Union. As the way we work – and the skills needed to do so – continues to rapidly evolve, it’s important that we have visibility into our organization’s skills so that we can easily identify specific skills needs, maximize workforce performance, and continue delivering exceptional service to our members,” said  . “With Oracle Dynamic Skills, we’ll be able to better understand and leverage the skills of our organization, gain critical workforce insights, and make more informed talent decisions. We are eager to take advantage of the new capabilities being introduced.” Built for the cloud, Oracle Cloud HCM is a complete solution connecting every human resource process from hire to retire across an organization with a native employee experience platform and embedded AI capabilities. By connecting all employee data on a single platform, HR teams have access to a single source of truth to help inform their people strategy. In addition, embedded AI acts as an advisor to help analyze workforce data, generate content, and augment or automate processes to help improve business operations.  👉  News Dot Media Pvt. Title: Bračni par Hajdarević iz BiH poginuo u saobraćajnoj nesreći u Austriji: U kolima bilo i njihovo dete (2) - Vesti - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
. Naime, u teškoj saobraćajnoj nesreći život je izgubio muškarac E.Hajdarević (33) i žena A.Hajdarević (28) iz Cazina, a dete je teško povređeno. Kako navode, E.Hajdarević se zabio u automobil 65-godišnjeg meštana koji je vozio ispred njega. Usled sudara je automobil kojim je upravljao E.H. je proklizao, te je udario u ogradu. Osim mladog para u vozilu je bilo i njihovo dete (2). Kako pišu austrijski mediji, žena je ostala zarobljena u vozilu, a nju je izvukla Vatrogasno-spasilačna služba. Dete je u nesreći zadobilo teške telesne povrede i prevezeno je u Okružnu bolnicu Kufštajn. Mladić je na licu mesta reanimiran, a zatim je prebačen u bolnicu sa teškim povredama. Žena je takođe zadobila teške povrede. Šezdesetpetogodišnji vozač uspeo je da zaustavi svoje vozilo. Na sreću, ostao je nepovređen. Deonica puta A12 bila je zatvorena oko sat i po tokom vršenja uviđaja. (Telegraf.rs/ ) Pošaljite nam Vaše snimke, fotografije i priče na broj telefona   (  /   /  ). Title: 61 autobus dolazi iz Rumunije u Srbiju zbog Brene: Pevačica će nastupiti na ovom događaju, masa "odlepila" - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
Muzička zvezda,  , nastupiće na 66. Danima berbe grožđa u Vršcu. Njen nastup privukao je veliko interesovanje obožavalaca iz regiona, posebno iz susedne Rumunije, gde se ova muzička ikona posebno poštuje. Iz susedne zemlje, najavljen je dolazak na koncert čak 61 autobusa. Zanimljivo je da to nisu autobusi koji će doći iz Temišvara, nego iz drugih gradova, a iz Temišvara, koji je od Vršca udaljen oko 70 kilometara, očekuje se najmanje još toliko gostiju. Lokalna samouprava u Vršcu uspešno se dogovorila sa najvećom zvezdom na prostoru Balkana, pa će Lepa Brena pevati 15. septembra. Pored posetilaca iz Rumunije, očekuje se i oko 10.000 posetilaca iz svih ostalih krajeva jer Brenini koncerti su spektakl. Lepa Brena je preko 40 godina na sceni. Iza sebe ima brojne uspehe, koncerte na punim stadionima, arene, filmove koji se sa istim žarom emituju i gledaju i dan danas, ima najtiražnije albume, velike turneje… I sve je to samo deo onog što čini karijeru naše poznate pevačice. Oriće se Vršcem hitovi poput: Duge noge, Došlo vreme da se pođe, Bato Bato, Bice Belaja, Danas plačem ja a sutra ćeš ti, Sitnije Cile sitnije, Boli me uvo za sve, Ja nemam drugi dom, Kuća laži, Pazi kome zavidiš, Kralj, Sledeći, Četiri godine, Dama Iz Londona, Dečko mi je školarac… i još mnogi drugi. Title: Fitnes i zdravlje - Ona.rs
Info Biz - Telegraf Biznis
Nole otkrio zašto decu školuje baš u Srbiji: "Nisu rođeni ovde, ali im pričam..." Ovu školu je odabrao za njih - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
Naš najbolji teniser   i njegova supruga Jelena decu školuje u Srbiji. , dok je sin Stefan pošao u peti. , o čemu se dosta pisalo početkom septembra ove godine. Nole je istakao da je njegova želja da se deca školuju u Srbiji jer želi da njegovi naslednici osete šta to znači - Srbija. -  - otkrio je Đoković. Dok je pričao o našem narodu, Novak se dotakao i priče o mlađim generacijama, tehnološkom napretku, ali i večite borbe roditelja sa decom da ona ne budu konstantno na telefonima, a ta granica se pomera konstantno. Đoković je istakao da njegovi naslednici i dalje nemaju telefone. - Od Jelene Genčić sam naučio zašto je bitno da slušaš klasičnu muziku, da čitaš knjige... Današnja generacija ima mnogo više izazova, tada nije bilo društvenih mreža, oni samo gledaju telefone. Ne gleda se sada iz druge perspektive, mi sada živimo u digitalnom dobu, tehnološki razvoj je neverovatan, moja deca i dalje nemaju telefone, moja supruga i ja se borimo. Oni se žale imaju svi sem nas u školi. Nije lako, a to se preslikava na druge nivoe. Ako svi nešto rade, stado radi ovako, moraš da pratiš. Pa, ne mora baš tako. To je ono gde mislim da se mi razlikujemo od drugih, jer smo svojeglavi i na pozitivan i na negativan način - rekao je Đoković u emisiji " ". - Izabrali su školu u kojoj časovi ne traju 45 minuta, roditelji su aktivno uključeni u obrazovanje, a deci se podstiče kreativnost - rekao je izvor nedavno. Title: Dom i dekor - Ona.rs
Poznati rusko-moldavski jutjuber popljuvao Srbiju, Rusi mu kukali na život ovde: "Bubašvabe, buka i buvljaci" - Vesti - Telegraf.rs
Article Content:
Čuveni rusko-moldavski jutrjuber je posetio Srbiju, gradove Beograd i Novi Sad, te razgovarao sa pripadnicima ruske dijaspore i ukazao na njihova iskustva u životu u Srbiji, ali i na brojne probleme sa kojima se susreću. U videu od 45 minuta koje je za nekoliko sati pogledala desetina hiljada ljudi, čuveni Vova je obišao delove Beograda koji nisu turistički -  buvljake, nehigijenska naselja, divlje deponije. Prčao je i o sukobima Srba sa pridošlim Rusima, zamerkama koje dobijaju, automobilima na ulicama koje je opisao rečju "smeće", bučnim komšijama u zgradama, lenjim srpskim radnicima i mnogo čemu drugom. Neki će reći da je preterao, a neko da je ukazao na naše nedostatke i minuse. Mnogi Rusi su mu se požalili da ih Srbi kritikuju što se ne integrišu, a jedan od Rusa u snimku, koje je jutjuber intervjuisao, bio je šokiran prizorom sa buvljaka -   tvrdi da je tamo video veštačku vaginu. Komentari na snimak su raznovrsni - od "ahahahaha, za 550 evra iznajmljuju ovu štalu sa psima u dvorištu i bubašvabama?! Bože, kako nas muzu, ljudi deluju OK, ali kako pristati na takve uslove?" "Selektivno negativno subjektivno iskustvo više ljudi. Odvratno. Ovde se uopšte ne radi o Srbiji", glasio je drugi komentar. "Momci kojima su po želji isključili muziku imali su veliku sreću. Normalno je da se ovde postavljaju koncertne ulične zvučnike i pali turbo-folk po celoj ulici (da se čuje kilometar unaokolo) cele noći. Došli smo do njih i zamolili ih da utišaju oko ponoći, kada smo shvatili da niko neće zaustaviti zabavu - gledali su nas potpuno bez razumevanja :). Rekli su dođi kod nas na rakiju, rođendan nam je. Bili smo kao - ehhh, napolju je noć, stišaj, ne. Na kraju, žurka je trajala do 2 sata ujutru, dok neko od meštana nije izdržao i pozvao policiju, svaka čast, došli su, ne baš brzo, ali su došli. Ove komšije nas sada ne pozdravljaju, jer misle da smo mi zvali policiju...", opisao je drugi Rus svoje muke u komentarima. Šta vi mislite? Title: Ima 36 godina, desetoro dece, a ima i unuče: Unuk je stariji od najmlađe ćerke, na hranu troše 2700 evra - Ona.rs
Article Content:
Vreme čitanja: oko 1 min. Vreme čitanja: oko 1 min. Ešli i Džeri Kozens žive u Americi i imaju veliku  . Kada kažemo veliku, to zaista i mislimo. Oni imaju čak desetoro dece i sad biste pomislili da su to neki sredovečni par ili čak onaj u poznoj starosti. Međutim, varate se. U pitanju su ljudi od 36 i 40 godina! Oni imaju   i verovali ili ne -  . Neko bi im dao ideju da sastave fudbalski tim. Ovaj bračni par je prvo dete dobio u tinejdžerskim danima. Prvo se rodila Aleksis koja danas ima 21 godinu i koja je rodila sina pre nego što je i ona sama dobila sestru. Zvuči zbunjujuće, zar ne? Na snimku se vidi Ešli koja drži u naručju ćerku Amoru (1), dok je pored nje ćerka Aleksis koja drži sina Keša (2). Osim Aleksis, bračni par ima i   Cela porodica je gostovala u jednoj emisiji gde su pričali o neplaniranom broju članova porodice, kao i mesečnim računa za struju, hranu i slično. Mesečno za hranu potroše oko 3.000 dolara,  - Veoma smo bliska porodica. Meni se dopada što smo mladi baka i deka, mogu da se igram sa njima non-stop. Ali znam da ljudi sve to gledaju na drugačiji način - rekla je Ešli, prenosi " ". Kaže ona da se ne žali što je ćerka takođe mlada postala majka, jer "oni su je dobili u 17 godina, kakav su oni njoj uzor?". Oni ne mare za komentarima i kažu da je važno imati zdravu i veliku porodicu. (Ona.rs) Pošaljite nam Vaše snimke, fotografije i priče na broj telefona   (  /   /  ). Imaćemo jači želju da negujemo naše odnose, dok ćemo istovremeno pojačavati društvenost i komunikaciju sa drugima. Vama je samo nebo granica. Sa dragom osobom, prijateljem ili rođakom ćete ostvariti zajednički poduhvat. Želećete da putujete i da istražite svet. Kod okoline ćete zavredeti veće poštovanje, a vama će samopouzdanje biti na visokom nivou. Bićete produktivni i povećaće se vaše finansije. Ovo je jedan od najskladnijih trenutaka u ovoj godini za vas. Biće vam romantični period i sve će vam ići od ruke. Dopustite sebi da zasijate. Više ćete vremena provoditi sa porodicom i prijateljima. Bićete više optimistični u pogledu svoje budućnosti. Negovaćete mir u sebi. Srećan je period za druženje sa prijateljima i poboljšanje društvenog života. Probaćete da nadoknadite izgubljeno vreme sa prijateljima. Sve će vam na poslu ići od ruke. Bićete kreativni, a i finansije će se povećati. Budite opušteniji u kontaktu sa nadređenima. Zadovoljstvo je tu. Oslobodićete se svoje uobičajene rutine i krenućete u nove avanture. Ako krenete da učite nešto, ići će vam od ruke. Možete ići na putovanje. Vama će fokus biti na bliskim ljudima. Vežbaćete praksu uma i tela i želećete partnera koji će vam uzvratiti istom merom. Ljubav i zabava će vam biti prioritet u ovom periodu. Uspećete da se povežete sa svima, a bićete i umetnički nastrojeni. Iskoristite svoj šarm za napredak na poslu. Probudite svoju maštu kako biste došli do cilja koji ste zacrtali. Ne odbacujte ideje. Imaćete sreće u izražavanju pred drugima. Dobar je trenutak da odbacite monotniju i da se uvedete sebi neke nove rutine. Bićete orijentisani na veze kako partnerske tako i porodične. Title: Šta je kolera, veoma zarazna bolest koja se pojavila u Bugarskoj: Ovako izgledaju simptomi - Ona.rs
Article Content: Vreme čitanja: oko 3 min. Vreme čitanja: oko 3 min. U pitanju je oblik teške   koja se može masovno širiti putem vode i izazvati infekciju. Ukoliko bolest nije na vreme registrovana i lečena na odgovarajući način, pacijent može da umre usled teške dehidracije.  Veliki broj zaraženih nema simptome bolesti, dok se kod jednog broja pacijenata javlja akutna dijareja i teška dehidracija. Stručnjaci naglašavaju da je kolera bolest koja se lako leči, ali „ako se ne leči, može da ubije čoveka u roku od nekoliko sati“. Prema podacima stručnjaka, 1 od 10 ljudi bolesnih od kolere razviće ozbiljne simptome. Kod onih koji imaju simptome, smrt može nastupiti u roku od nekoliko sati ukoliko se ne počne sa odgovarajućim lečenjem. Tokom 2020. godine, od kolere je umrlo 857 osoba u 24 zemlje. Veruje se da je stvarni broj mnogo veći, navodi Svetska zdravstvena organizacija. Kolera je teška akutna crevna bolest a praendemsko žarište kolere je delta Ganga i Bramaputre. Izazivač je Vibrion cholerae, gram-negativni, aerobni bacil, klasičnog ili El Tor biotipa.  Česta i   povraćanje i jaki stomačni grčevi su mogući znaci bolesti. Stručnjaci savetuju da se u rizičnim zemljama pije flaširana, prečišćena voda i da se vodi računa o higijeni. Vakcinacija pruža privremenu zaštitu osobama za koje postoji veliki rizik od inficiranja, ili im je oslabljen imunitet. Pre dve godine, u   Serološkim testovima  , potvrđeno je da se radi o koleri. Kineski stručnjaci su preuzeli, kako naglašavaju, sve neophodne mere kako bi se pronašli kontakti i zaustavilo moguće širenje bolesti. Za sada nisu otkriveni novi slučajevi kolere, a posle lečenja, stanje pacijenta kod kojeg je potvrđena kolera je „ „, saopštilo je Okružno odeljenje za zdravstvo Univerziteta Vuhan. Nakon efikasne dijagnoze i lečenja, stanje pacijenta je postalo stabilno, a simptomi su nestali, saopštio je lokalni Centar za kontrolu i prevenciju bolesti.  Poslednji slučajevi kolere u Srbiji zabeleženi su 1989. godine kada je registrovano 16 slučajeva u Dimitrovgradu. Takođe, 1984. su registrovana dva slučaja kod naših građana koji su se oboleli vratili u zemlju i koji su se zarazili na putovanju u zemlje u kojima je kolera endemska bolest. "Mi naših slučajeva kolere nismo imali u dugom vremenskom periodu, tako da nema osnova za strah, ali da je neophodna opreznost, posebno kada putujemo u rizična područja", napomenula je u februaru ove godine u Jutarnjem programu dr Violeta Rakić, specijalista epidemiologije sa Instituta za javno zdravlje „Dr Milan Jovanović Batut“. Title: Nemci povukli potez koji može uticati na Srbe: Otvorili granice za migrante s prosečnom platom od 200 evra - Telegraf Biznis
Article Content:
Vreme čitanja: oko 2 min. Vreme čitanja: oko 2 min. , koje se suočava sa velikim  Nemački kancelar Olaf Šolc rekao je na zajedničkoj konferenciji za novinare u Berlinu sa kenijskim predsednikom Vilijamom Rutom da zahvaljujući ovom sporazumu, kvalifikovani radnici će moći da dođu u Nemačku, a mladi ljudi će moći da dođu na studije. Prema rečima kancelara, ova saradnja može pomoći u ublažavanju nedostatka radne snage, čiji efekti su već osetni u nemačkoj ekonomiji, izveštava MTI, a prenosi  . - Osnova naše sreće je to što smo otvoreni prema svetu, i moramo očuvati to - izjavio je Šolc, dodajući da je, pored otvorenosti, veoma važno jasno ograničiti ilegalnu imigraciju. Nemački kancelar je rekao da sporazum takođe obezbeđuje da se oni koji nezakonito borave u Nemačkoj mogu efikasnije da se vrate u Keniju. Viliam Ruto pohvalio je "ogroman ljudski kapital", inovativnu snagu i kreativnost svoje zemlje. Istakao je da je prosečna starost stanovništva u Keniji 20 godina. Nemačka vlada je već potpisala slične sporazume o migraciji sa Indijom, Marokom i Gruzijom, a sledeće nedelje će potpisati ugovor sa Uzbekistanom. Takođe se priprema slična saradnja sa Moldavijom, Kirgistanom i Filipinima. Prema  , Kenija ima 56.658.088 stanovnika. Prosečna plata u Keniji varira u zavisnosti od nekoliko faktora kao što je iskustvo, industrija u kojoj radi, kao i na kojoj lokaciji ali i nivo obrazovanja. Prosečna mesečna plata u Keniji, u različitim sektorima, procenjuje se između 30.000 i 130.000 kenijskih šilinga (KES) mesečno piše na sajtu  . Ovakav potez se verovatno može osetiti i na koži naših gastarbajtera, jer sada u Nemačku stiže radna snaga koja je radila za 200 evra mesečno! Inače, pretpostavlja se da u Nemačkoj živi između 400.000 i 800.000 Srba. Podsetimo, Nemci su 1. juna uveli novi zakon o useljavanju kvalifikovanih radnika, koji ima za cilj da privuče više kvalifikovanih radnika iz zemalja koje nisu članice EU-a, što je i te kako značajno za Srbiju. Prema podacima iz avgusta, tzv. kartice prilike izdato je skoro 200 viza po ovoj pravnoj osnovi, navelo je tada Ministarstvo spoljnih poslova. Postoje i poeni za kvalifikacije u deficitarnim zanimanjima. Svako ko ima dovoljan broj poena može doći u Nemačku i onda ima godinu dana da traži stalni posao. Pod određenim uslovima moguće je jednokratno produženje za dve godine. (Telegraf Biznis) Pošaljite nam Vaše snimke, fotografije i priče na broj telefona   (  /   /  ). Evo da vam kažem,to sto dodje prvo treba stan da nadje koji je za jednisoban stan najmanje 600€ hladan.A ako se uma porodica dodje j do 1500€,zavisi gde.Kada se tome dodaju troškovi struje goriva i hrane.ispod 1800€ samac a porodica ispod 3000€ ne može da živi..Tako da ko god dodje i misli da je to lako..Zajebao se Ne vidim da razlikuju se plate u Keniji i Srbiji.. Odlično je poznato da na jugu Srbije su plate užas pa i tih 250evra (konkretno u Pazaru, radnice u marketima, trafikama, radi se za pola minimalca), malo severnije zarade rastu.. Međutim ne preko tih 950 evra kao u Keniji, profesori u srednjim skolama, medicinsko osoblje, uzeo sam ih kao najplacenije u našem društvu.. Title: Putinovo poslednje upozorenje pred katastrofu: Svet na ivici sukoba nuklearnih sila - Blic
Article Content:
Na samitu u Beloj kući, Velika Britanija i Sjedinjene Američke Države spremaju se da donesu sudbonosnu odluku i dozvole Ukrajini da koristi zapadno oružje dugog dometa za udare na teritoriju Rusije. Ruski predsednik Vladimir Putin unapred je burno reagovao na potencijalno donošenje odluke, rekavši da to znači da NATO savez ulazi u rat protiv Rusije. Naredni dani predstavljaju prekretnicu kada je reč o ratu u Ukrajini, koji više nego ikada ranije preti da postane veliki sukob nuklearnih sila.  
    U poslednjem pokušaju da zastraši Zapad,  je upozorio da će takav dogovor  . 
 
                     
                     
                 
                     
                     
                 
                     
                     
                 
    -  - rekao je on.
 
    Pretnja je stigla dok je britanski premijer   još bio na putu za Vašington uoči razgovora sa američkim predsednikom  o mogućoj upotrebi britanskih raketa "Storm Shadow" na ruskoj teritoriji.
 
    -  - uzvratio je Starmer. 
 
    Vojni eksperti smatraju da bilo kakve smernice o upotrebi britanskih raketa koje budu dogovorene na samitu u Vašingtonu 
 
    Portparol Kremlja   je sugerisao da je sastanak između Starmera i Bajdena samo formalnost i da je  
 
    Američki saveznici Ukrajine dugo su se protivili tome da daju zeleno svetlo ukrajinskom predsedniku   da koristi balističke rakete dugog dometa protiv snaga Kremlja unutar Rusije, plašeći se da bi  
 
    Međutim, dinamika se drastično promenila, pretežno zbog velike    , sa napredovanjem ka strateškom gradu  . 
 
    Samit u Beloj kući predstavlja vrhunac nedelje intenzivne diplomatije između zapadnih saveznika. Američki državni sekretar proveo je dane u razgovorima sa britanskim i ukrajinskim kolegama.
 
    -  - rekao je za "Politiko" jedan zvaničnik britanske vlade, koji je, poput drugih u ovoj priči, želeo da ostane anoniman. 
 
    Četiri britanska zvaničnika rekla su da ne očekuju nikakvu formalnu objavu ovog vikenda. Jedan je rekao da se nadaju da će dogovor biti potvrđen na Generalnoj skupštini Ujedinjenih nacija kasnije ovog meseca, kada će se svetski lideri, uključujući Bajdena i Starmera, okupiti u Njujorku.
 
     
 
    Drugi britanski zvaničnik rekao je da su otkrića da  počinje da obezbeđuje balističke rakete Rusiji promenila zapadno razmišljanje.
 
    -  - rekao je on. 
 
    Ostali zvaničnici širom  povukli su istu paralelu. 
 
    - - kažu diplomate za "Politiko". 
 
      navodeći da postojeće restrikcije ostavljaju Kremlju slobodu da „lovi“ ukrajinske snage bez straha od odmazde.
 
    Lideri baltičkih zemalja su podržali njegove pozive, insistirajući da su strahovi Vašingtona o eskalaciji neosnovani.
 
     . Jedan zapadni zvaničnik i dve druge osobe upućene u pregovore rekli su da mali broj zvaničnika Bele kuće radi na finalizaciji plana za proširenje područja unutar Rusije koje Ukrajina može da gađa američkim i britanskim oružjem.
 
    Postoji nekoliko komplikacija u dozvoljavanju Ukrajini da napada ciljeve unutar Rusije raketama "Storm Shadow", uključujući  
 
     , sa druge strane, ne sumnja da je izjava predsednika Rusije Vladimira Putina o posledicama mogućih udara zapadnim oružjem duboko na teritoriji Rusije , rekao je portparol Kremlja Dmitrij Peskov.
 
    -  - istakao je predstavnik Kremlja.
 
    Ruski predsednik je ukazao da bi odluka da se ukrajinskoj vojsci dozvoli da izvrši udare zapadnim oružjem duboko na teritoriji Rusije značila direktno učešće zemalja NATO-a, SAD i evropskih zemalja u ratu u Ukrajini.
 
    To će, prema Putinovim rečima,
